meanings.definition: Having a lot of plots or schemes.
meanings.sent1: The plottiest character in the story always had a new plan up their sleeve.
meanings.sent2: She was known as the plottiest person in the office, always coming up with new ideas.
meanings.sent3: The plottiest squirrel in the park was constantly trying to outsmart the other animals.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like the plottiest maze, full of twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The plottiest movie of the year kept the audience guessing until the very end.

meanings.sent1: Out of all the plots in the book, the plottiest one was the most intriguing.
meanings.sent2: The plottiest of all the stories in the anthology was the most complex.
meanings.sent3: The plottiest twist in the movie made everyone gasp in surprise.
meanings.sent4: His plan was the plottiest of them all, with layers of deception.
meanings.sent5: The plottiest chapter in the novel left readers eager for more.
